summary: 2002 MAZDA TRIBUTE SHUTS OFF AUTOMATICALLY WHILE DRIVING.  LOCKING THE STEERING WHEEL AND GIVING YOU NO CONTROL OF THE VEHICLE.  IT HAS BEEN IN FOR REPAIR SEVERAL TIMES.  I AM WORKING ON A LEMON LAW PACKAGE NOW.  MAJOR SAFETY ISSUE.  THIS HAS HAPPENED OVER 10 TIMES IN 10 MONTHS OF LEASING THIS VEHICLE .
